title: Stock Futures Slip Ahead of Tech Earnings
sub_head: Results are due from Alphabet and Microsoft after the closing bell
body:
U.S. stock futures edged down ahead of a wave of earnings reports from major technology and blue-chip firms as investors contended with fears about slowing growth.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 shed 0.3%. Dow Jones Industrial Average Futures declined 0.3% and technology-heavy Nasdaq-100 futures lost 0.4%.
